statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, cost, shipping_cost FROM inventory_items WHERE tax_rate > 15.00;
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory_items ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE cost BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT id, product_name, cost, shipping_cost, tax_rate FROM inventory_items WHERE cost > 100.00 ORDER BY tax_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT id, product_name, cost + shipping_cost AS total_cost FROM inventory_items WHERE tax_rate < 10
SELECT product_name, tax_rate * 100 AS tax_percentage FROM inventory_items
SELECT id, product_name, cost + shipping_cost + (cost * tax_rate) AS total_price FROM inventory_items WHERE shipping_cost > 5
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost, MAX(tax_rate) AS max_tax_rate FROM inventory_items
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, cost_price, selling_price FROM products WHERE cost_price < 100
SELECT product_name, profit_margin FROM products ORDER BY profit_margin DESC
SELECT * FROM shipping_costs
SELECT shipping_method, shipping_cost FROM shipping_costs WHERE shipping_cost > 10
SELECT product_name, selling_price FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE profit_margin > 0.20 ORDER BY cost_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, cost_price, selling_price, profit_margin FROM products WHERE cost_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT shipping_method, shipping_cost FROM shipping_costs WHERE shipping_cost < 10 ORDER BY shipping_method ASC;
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, AVG(selling_price) AS average_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, cost FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products WHERE cost > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts WHERE shipping_method = 'Express';
SELECT product_name, tax_rate FROM Products JOIN Taxes ON Products.product_id = Taxes.product_id;
SELECT product_name, cost FROM Products WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM ShippingCosts WHERE cost > 50;
SELECT product_name, cost, quantity FROM Products WHERE cost BETWEEN 10 AND 100;
SELECT tax_rate FROM Taxes WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, shipping_method, cost FROM Products p JOIN ShippingCosts s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, i.quantity, s.shipping_cost FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN shipments s ON i.inventory_id = s.inventory_id WHERE s.shipping_cost > 50;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, tax_rate, country FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN taxes t ON i.quantity > 20 AND p.unit_price < 50 AND t.country = 'USA';

SELECT product_name, quantity, shipping_cost, tax_rate FROM products p JOIN inventory i ON p.product_id = i.product_id JOIN shipments s ON i.inventory_id = s.inventory_id JOIN taxes t ON i.product_id = t.tax_id ORDER BY quantity ASC, shipping_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, cost FROM Product WHERE cost > 50;
SELECT * FROM Shipping ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_id, date, total_cost FROM Transaction WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE cost > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT product_name, cost, tax_rate FROM Product WHERE tax_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.5 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.date, p.product_name, t.total_cost, t.shipping_cost FROM Transaction t JOIN Product p ON t.product_id = p.product_id WHERE t.total_cost > 100 ORDER BY t.date DESC
SELECT p.product_name, pr.total_sales, pr.total_costs, pr.total_profit FROM Product p JOIN Profitability pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id WHERE pr.total_profit < 5000
